plugins.name: Guideflow - AI-Powered Interactive Demos & Guides
plugins.description:
Guideflow Figma Plugin: Transform Your Figma Designs into Interactive Demos and Guides with Ease


The Guideflow Figma plugin empowers designers and non-designers alike to quickly turn Figma frames into interactive demos, step-by-step guides, GIFs, and videos. Whether youre working in product, marketing, customer success, or design, Guideflow makes it simple to create engaging, dynamic presentations from your Figma designs, without needing any coding skills.


Why use Guideflow?

Guideflow takes your Figma frames and brings them to life, providing a seamless transition from static design to interactive experience. Whether you're preparing a product demo, creating user guides, or showcasing design concepts, Guideflow allows you to elevate your communication by transforming designs into fully functional, trackable walkthroughs and videos.


Key Benefits:


Instant Interactive Demos

Export your Figma frames directly to Guideflow, where you can build interactive demos in minutes. Whether for a product demo or a UX flow, Guideflow allows you to visually guide users through the design, providing them with a hands-on experience.


Step-by-Step Walkthroughs

Create detailed walkthroughs for any use case, including user onboarding, tutorials, and internal training. Each step can be annotated with helpful instructions, animated elements, and dynamic transitions, guiding viewers through the process effortlessly.


Flexible Output Options

Choose how you want to share your interactive demos or guides. With Guideflow, you can generate interactive web demos, export GIFs, or create polished videos from your Figma frames. Whether you need a live interactive demo or a shareable video presentation, Guideflow has you covered.


Enhanced Collaboration & Feedback

Empower your entire team to participate in the design process. Guideflow allows designers, marketers, and product managers to collaborate seamlessly, sharing interactive demos or guides for feedback, validation, or user testing. Real-time sharing and engagement tracking ensure that your team and stakeholders are always on the same page.


No Code Required

Anyone can create with Guideflow, even without design or coding expertise. Simply select the frames from Figma, export to Guideflow, and start adding interactivity like animated hotspots, transitions, and voiceoversall without needing a single line of code.


Features that Set Guideflow Apart:

Customizable Elements: Add voiceovers, branching paths, embedded forms, and animated annotations to personalize your demo or guide.


Real-Time Engagement Tracking: See whos interacting with your demos, track viewer engagement, and identify drop-off points to improve your content.


Multiple Sharing Options: Share your interactive demo as a personalized link, embed it directly into websites or documents, or export it as an MP4 or GIF for easy distribution.


How to Get Started:


  1. Select Your Figma Frames: Choose the specific frames or series of frames from your Figma project that you want to bring into Guideflow.
  2. Export to Guideflow: With the click of a button, your selected frames are transferred to Guideflow, where you can begin to enhance them with interactivity, guidance, and customization.
  3. Add Interactive Elements: Use Guideflows intuitive interface to add animations, transitions, voiceovers, or text annotations. Highlight key actions and guide your audience through each step.
  4. Share & Track Engagement: Once your demo or guide is complete, share it with your team or users via a link, embed it in web pages, or export it as a video or GIF. Monitor engagement and get insights into user interactions.


Use Cases:

  1. Product Demos: Perfect for showcasing new features or flows to clients and stakeholders.
  2. User Onboarding: Build step-by-step guides to help new users get up to speed quickly and efficiently.
  3. Design Feedback: Share interactive designs with your team for feedback, reviews, or testing, ensuring everyone is aligned on the final vision.
  4. Marketing Presentations: Export stunning, animated GIFs or videos from your Figma designs to support marketing campaigns, social media, or pitches.


With the Guideflow Figma plugin, turning your designs into interactive, shareable experiences is faster and easier than ever. Whether you're creating for internal teams or external audiences, Guideflow offers the flexibility and power you need to communicate your ideas effectively.
plugins.tagline: Create interactive demos & guides from Figma

plugins.name: Smart Data
plugins.description:
Supercharge your text handling in Figma with Smart Data! This plugin gives you complete control over text manipulation with a wide variety of options. From sorting to generating random texts, injecting names, dates, Lorem Ipsum, and much more!


Features at a Glance


  1. Random Data : Inject randomly generated data based on your custom template.
  2. Repeat Data : Apply a single text template across all selected text layers.
  3. Generate Dates : Generate sequential date-time data with your preferred format.
  4. Random Names : Automatically assign random names based on different regions (US, APAC, LATAM, MEA, EU).
  5. Sequential Data : Seamlessly generate sequential alphanumeric data (`ABC`, `123`, `abc`, or custom patterns!).
  6. Randomize Predefined Data : Randomly pick data from a comma-separated list of possibilities and assign it to text layers.
  7. Sort Text : Automatically sort text either in ascending or descending orders (great for organizing items!).
  8. Lorem Ipsum Generator : Quickly fill text layers with dummy content using a configurable number of words.
  9. Paste Data : Easily bulk-paste excel column data into selected text layers


How To Use?


  1. Select Text Layers ( preferably on a data grid / table column ) in Figma .
  2. Launch the Plugin and choose your desired text operation.
  3. Provide any necessary input (optional, depending on the operation).
  4. Press the Change Text Button .
  5. Done! Watch as your selected text layers update in real-time.



Use Cases


  1. UI Mockups : Generate placeholder texts for wireframes.
  2. Data-driven design : Quickly align number-based designs or charts.
  3. Generating form content : Design registration forms or profile pages faster with name, date, and random data generators.
  4. Consistent repetition : Apply the same text format across several elements programmatically
plugins.tagline: Supercharge your text handling in Figma with Smart Data!

plugins.name: Tailwind CSS v4 variables to Figma
plugins.description:
Tailwind CSS v4 variables to Figma


A Figma plugin that allows to input CSS variables in Tailwind v4 format and introduces the feature to import them in Figma as Local Variables or Local Styles.


Current Stage

This plugin supports formats:

  1. HEX
  2. RGBA
  3. RGB


Usage

Local Variables

If you choose to import the CSS variables as Local Variables you should fill the "Collection Name" input field in order to give a name of the collection where the variables will be stored.


If a collection with this name exists it will append or override the inported variables to the collection.


The CSS variables are entered in the big textbox "CSS Variables"


Local Styles

If you choose to import the CSS variables as Local Styles it is only required to fill the "CSS Variables" textbox


If there are styles that already exist they will be overriden.
plugins.tagline: Import your Tailwind v4 config CSS variables in Figma as variables or styles

plugins.description:
English Description ( .)

Variables2Sheets - Complete Figma Variables Management Solution

Transform your Figma workflow with Variables2Sheets, the comprehensive plugin for managing design variables through spreadsheets. From simple exports to complete design system maintenance, streamline your variable management process with powerful features designed for modern design teams.


What's New - Major Update

Now supporting ALL Figma variable types with enhanced functionality:


Complete Variable Type Support

  1. String - Text content and multi-language management
  2. Color - Color system and palette management
  3. Number - Spacing, sizing, and numeric values
  4. Boolean - State management (true/false)


Alias Support

  1. String, Color, Number, Boolean Alias fully supported
  2. Manage complex variable reference relationships effortlessly
  3. Advanced feature for actual value resolution


Advanced Collection Management

  1. Move variables between collections directly from spreadsheets
  2. Auto-create new collections when needed
  3. Reorganize your design system structure effortlessly


Multi-Language Interface

  1. Korean language support for local teams
  2. Perfect for global design teams and CMS workflows
  3. Additional languages coming soon


Enhanced User Experience

  1. System theme support (Dark/Light mode)
  2. Auto-refresh collections
  3. Streamlined interface for better productivity


Key Features

  1. Export to CSV/JSON formats
  2. Import edited variables back to Figma
  3. Copy variables directly to clipboard for Google Sheets
  4. Choose specific collections to export
  5. Seamless cross-project variable management


User Guide: https://nine0109.github.io/note/Public/2025-05-25_variables2sheets_guide

plugins.name: Smart Background
plugins.description:
Smart Background Color is designed to intelligently generate harmonized background colors for your selected images, giving your designs a polished, cohesive look. Whether you're working with individual images or a collection, SmartColor automatically suggests colors based on the dominant tones in your images. You can apply these smart backgrounds in several ways:


  1. Per-Image: Create individual harmonized backgrounds for each selected image.
  2. Combined Background: Generate a single, unified background color that works harmoniously with all selected images. Customize further by choosing how to apply the background
  3. New Rectangle Object: Insert a new background layer behind each image.
  4. Image Border Color: Apply the harmonized color to the border of each selected image.
  5. Artboard Background: Apply the smart background to the selected artboard for a unified look.


Enhance your workflow with Smart Background and bring harmony to your designs in just a few clicks.
plugins.tagline: Automatic background harmonization with selected images

You can automatically assign consecutive numbers to the upper left corner of selected objects. This is useful when creating materials that explain multiple images or design proposals.


Supported sequential number styles:

plugins.name: image Export Assistant
plugins.description:
Introduction

The Image Export Assistant is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline and organize the process of exporting images for multiple platforms. Whether you're working on iOS, Android, or Web projects, this plugin ensures your assets are perfectly scaled and neatly categorized.


Function Description

  1. Preset Configurations: Choose from predefined presets for iOS, Android, or Web to automatically set up export scales, prefixes, and suffixes.
  2. Multiple Formats: Export your designs in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP.
  3. Organized Folder Structure: Utilize prefixes to automatically create folder structures within ZIP archives, ensuring your exports are well-organized.
  4. Customizable Export Options: Add, modify, or delete export configurations to suit your specific project needs.
  5. Efficient Workflow: Save time by managing all your export settings in one place, reducing repetitive tasks and minimizing errors.


How to Use

  1. Select Elements: Choose one or more elements in your Figma project that you wish to export.
  2. Run the Plugin: Navigate to Plugins > Image Export Assistant > Export.
  3. Choose Preset: Click on a preset button (iOS, Android, or Web) to automatically configure export settings, or manually adjust scales, prefixes, and suffixes as needed.
  4. Select Format: Choose your desired export format from the dropdown menu (PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, WEBP).
  5. Export: Click the Export button to generate and download a ZIP file containing your organized exports.


Notes

  1. Prefix Formatting: Ensure that prefixes end with a / to create proper folder structures within the ZIP archive.
  2. Browser Compatibility: Some formats like WEBP require browser support for Canvas toDataURL conversions.
  3. ZIP Archives: The plugin always generates a ZIP file, even for single exports, to maintain consistency and organization.
  4. Logging: Detailed logs are available in the developer console to help troubleshoot any issues during the export process.

  2. PNGJPGSVGPDFWEBP
  3. ZIP

Hexify helps you transform your Figma Color Collections into usable code - whether you're working with SCSS, CSS, or JSON. It's here to make your workflow a little easier, a little tidier, and a lot more fun.

plugins.name: Variables export to Gitlab
plugins.description:
Figma Variables Export Plugin Instruction


The Figma Variables plugin was developed to convert Figma Variables into SASS variables. 

To use this plugin you should have some Local variables in your Figma project


The plugin has 2 features:

  1. Export file with SASS variables in .scss format
  2. Publish file with SASS variables into Gitlab and create a merge request


Export file with SASS variables in .scss format

For exporting Figma Local Variables as SASS variables you just need to click the Export button


By clicking on the Export button the file with .scss extension will be created. It will contain all Figma local variables in SASS format.


This file can be used in the UI project that uses SASS variables. After any changes in Figma Local Variables all is needed is just to make export of variables into the project directory again and the state of Local Variables will be synchronized with the state of SASS variables in the UI project.


Publish file with SASS variables into Gitlab and create a merge request

This feature is more advanced. It suggests that SASS variables are placed in some file that is stored in a Gitlab repository. For using this feature we need to set our Gitlab settings:


  1. Gitlab Domain (gitlab.com or another)
  2. Gitlab Token (user can get it from Gitlab settings)
  3. Target branch where you should create a merge request with changes
  4. Path to file with variables (i.e. src/variables.scss)
  5. Project Id (user can see it on gitlab project's page)


By clicking on Publish button the plugin performs the next steps:

  1. Creates new branch for updates
  2. Editing the .scss file from the File Path input
  3. Creates a merge request with changes in this file from just created branch into the Target Branch


After that a person who has permissions of merging can open Gitlab, check changes and merge them.


This feature makes UI project synchronization with Figma mockups more seamless and stable. After making any changes in Figma variables, UX Designer needs only click the Publish button, and UI developer needs only check these changes in Gitlab and click Merge Changes button.
plugins.tagline: Export Figma variables to .scss file of push them to file in Gitlab repository

plugins.description:
ColorCheck WCAG es un plugin minimalista y funcional diseado para facilitar a diseadores y desarrolladores la verificacin de contrastes de colores de acuerdo con las pautas WCAG. Esta herramienta MVP te permite probar combinaciones de colores de fondo y texto para garantizar accesibilidad y cumplir con estndares de diseo inclusivo.


Caractersticas Clave

  1. Clculo de ndice de Contraste: Evala rpidamente los niveles A, AA y AAA de contraste segn WCAG 2.1.
  2. Selector de Colores Intuitivo: Configura fcilmente el color de fondo y texto con selectores HEX y visores dinmicos.
  3. Resultados Claros: Obtn informacin inmediata sobre el cumplimiento de cada nivel con una interfaz limpia y amigable.


Cmo Funciona?

  1. Selecciona tus colores: Ingresa o selecciona un color de fondo y un color de texto desde el selector integrado.
  2. Revisa el contraste: Visualiza el ndice de contraste y verifica si cumple con los niveles A, AA o AAA de accesibilidad.
  3. Itera tus combinaciones: Ajusta colores para lograr resultados ptimos en segundos.


Tu Feedback es Importante

ColorCheck WCAG es un MVP en constante evolucin, quiero saber qu necesitas! Qu funcionalidades adicionales te gustara ver? Deja tus comentarios y recomendaciones para ayudarme a mejorar en las prximas versiones.

plugins.name: Decision Trackr
plugins.description:
No more meetings to debate decisions that have been made already.


Decision Trackr is a plugin that helps design teams capture, document, and review critical design decisions directly within their Figma projects. Select an element, log a decision and maintain a chronological version history of decisions made per element.


How to use it:

  1. Select the element to attach to your decision.
  2. Enter the decision and a reason.
  3. Add decision makers.
  4. Log your decision!


A decision history page is created and all decisions are properly versioned and link directly to the element relating to the decision.


Key Features:


Link Decisions to Elements: Decision Trackr lets users attach design decisions directly to elements within a Figma file. This makes it easy to understand the rationale behind each design component and offers context to anyone viewing the file.


Decision History and Versioning: Each decision can be updated and versioned, providing a chronological record of changes and their respective contexts. This historical view is invaluable for teams who may revisit past iterations or need to understand how and why certain design choices were made.


Decision ownership: Tag each decision with attendees or decision-maker's names. Each name is recorded and assigned to a decision. When ownership of a decision is clear, design jams become a place for robust and productive debate.


This plugin is a must-have for teams who like to own their work, make clear decisions and talk about the right things in meetings. No more meetings to debate decisions that have been made already.
plugins.tagline: Quickly log, review, and manage design decisions within your Figma files.

More:

plugins.name: Pictoria
plugins.description:
Unlock Your Creative Potential with Our Figma Plugin!

Transform Your Designs with GIFs, Images, and AI!


Elevate your design process with our all-in-one Figma plugin that seamlessly integrates Giphy, Unsplash, and OpenAI. Whether you're a UI/UX designer, marketer, or creative professional, this plugin is your go-to tool for adding dynamic visuals and intelligent content to your projects.


Key Features:


Search GIFs from Giphy: Quickly find and insert animated GIFs that perfectly match your design's tone and message. Simply type in a keyword, browse through a diverse selection, and bring your projects to life with eye-catching animations.


Access Stunning Images from Unsplash: Effortlessly search for high-quality, royalty-free images to complement your designs. With a vast library at your fingertips, you can find the perfect backdrop, illustration, or visual asset to enhance your creative work.


AI-Powered Content Suggestions from OpenAI: Harness the power of AI to generate descriptive text, taglines, or creative ideas directly within your Figma project. Just provide a prompt, and let OpenAI assist you in brainstorming and refining your design concepts.


How to Use

Search for GIFs or Images:


  1. Enter your keyword in the search bar.
  2. Browse the results and click on the one you love.
  3. Voila! Its in your Figma design!


Generate AI Images:


  1. Use the AI image generator by providing a creative description.
  2. Watch as AI generates a unique visual based on your input.
  3. Add it directly to your Figma canvas and start designing!


Benefits of Using Our Plugin:


Boost Engagement: Add dynamic GIFs and captivating visuals that draw attention and keep users engaged.

Streamline Your Workflow: Access GIFs, images, and AI-generated content all in one place, saving you time and keeping you focused on your design work.

Inspire Creativity: Explore a variety of GIFs and images that spark new ideas and help you think outside the box.

User-Friendly Interface: Designed for ease of use, our plugin is perfect for designers of all skill levels.


Get Started Today! Transform your design workflow with the ultimate creative toolkit. Install our Figma plugin and unlock a world of GIFs, stunning images, and AI-powered suggestions that will take your projects to the next level.
plugins.tagline: Figma plugin that allows users to enhance their design project by easily searching.
